Package org.opengrok.indexer.index

Class IndexDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opengrok.indexer.index.IndexDatabase
  • public class IndexDatabase
extends Object
    This class is used to create / update the index databases. Currently we use one index database per project.
    Author:
    Trond Norbye, Lubos Kosco , update for lucene 4.x , 5.x

    • Constructor Detail

      • IndexDatabase

        public IndexDatabase()
              throws IOException
        Create a new instance of the Index Database. Use this constructor if you don't use any projects
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurs while creating directories

      • IndexDatabase

        public IndexDatabase​(Project project)
              throws IOException
        Create a new instance of an Index Database for a given project.
        Parameters:
        project - the project to create the database for
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurs while creating directories

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public static void update​(IndexChangedListener listener,
                          List<String> paths)
        Update the index database for a number of sub-directories.
        Parameters:
        listener - where to signal the changes to the database
        paths - list of paths to be indexed

      • addDirectory

        public boolean addDirectory​(String dir)
        By default the indexer will traverse all directories in the project. If you add directories with this function update will just process the specified directories.
        Parameters:
        dir - The directory to scan
        Returns:
        true if the file is added, false otherwise

      • update

        public void update()
            throws IOException
        Update the content of this index database.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurs

      • optimize

        public void optimize()
              throws IOException
        Optimize the index database.
        Throws:
        IOException - I/O exception

      • addIndexChangedListener

        public void addIndexChangedListener​(IndexChangedListener listener)
        Register an object to receive events when modifications is done to the index database.
        Parameters:
        listener - the object to receive the events

      • getAllFiles

        public static Set<String> getAllFiles​(List<String> subFiles)
                               throws IOException
        Get all files in some of the index databases.
        Parameters:
        subFiles - Subdirectories of various projects or null or an empty list to get everything
        Returns:
        set of files in the index databases specified by the subFiles parameter
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurs

      • getFiles

        public Set<String> getFiles()
                     throws IOException
        Get all files in this index database.
        Returns:
        set of files in this index database
        Throws:
        IOException - If an IO error occurs while reading from the database

      • getNumFiles

        public int getNumFiles()
                throws IOException
        Get number of documents in this index database.
        Returns:
        number of documents
        Throws:
        IOException - if I/O exception occurred

      • listTokens

        public void listTokens​(int freq)
                throws IOException
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getIndexReader

        public static org.apache.lucene.index.IndexReader getIndexReader​(String path)
        Get an indexReader for the Index database where a given file.
        Parameters:
        path - the file to get the database for
        Returns:
        The index database where the file should be located or null if it cannot be located.

      • getDefinitions

        public static Definitions getDefinitions​(File file)
                                  throws org.apache.lucene.queryparser.classic.ParseException,
                                         IOException,
                                         ClassNotFoundException
        Get the latest definitions for a file from the index.
        Parameters:
        file - the file whose definitions to find
        Returns:
        definitions for the file, or null if they could not be found
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error happens when accessing the index
        org.apache.lucene.queryparser.classic.ParseException - if an error happens when building the Lucene query
        ClassNotFoundException - if the class for the stored definitions instance cannot be found

      • getDocument

        public static org.apache.lucene.document.Document getDocument​(File file)
                                                       throws IOException,
                                                              org.apache.lucene.queryparser.classic.ParseException
        Parameters:
        file - File object of a file under source root
        Returns:
        Document object for the file or null
        Throws:
        IOException - on I/O error
        org.apache.lucene.queryparser.classic.ParseException - on problem with building Query
